alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 31 at 2:25AM PDT until September 01 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 9 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, Eastern Sierra Slopes, Owens Valley, White Mountains of Inyo County and Death Valley National Park. In Nevada, Esmeralda and Central Nye County and Western Clark and Southern Nye County. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 9 PM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle on Highway 395. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
